text: Soak the Babri Beoul Seeds in a bowl in water for 1 day.  Observe the change in the texture of the seeds the moment the water is added to the seeds. It is a really amazing one. Add more water if required.  Observe the swelled part of the seeds and add water if necessary as the seeds need to be properly soaked to get the taste.  Change the bowl for the proper soaking of the seeds as this gives a good glace to the end product.  Boil Milk. Let the milk cool down. Add sugar.  Mix well.  Add soaked Bari Beol seeds.  Mix well.Observe the glassiness in the milk.  Add grated dried coconut pieces.  Mix well.  Add crushed cardamoms.  Mix well.  Pour in glasses.  Sprinkle the saffron strands.  Observe the color around the saffron strands.  Refrigerate the glasses for 5 to 6 hours.  Serve at the evening hours to break fasts in Ramzaan month or drink it in summer months( specially in the evening hours).
